Package index

Guides to go

These guides are complete and ready to use in your plots.

guide_axis_base()
Custom axis guide
guide_axis_dendro()
Dendrogram guide
guide_axis_nested()
Nested axis guide
guide_circles()
Circle size guide
guide_colbar()
Custom colour bar guide
guide_colring()
Colour rings and arcs
guide_colsteps()
Custom colour steps guide
guide_legend_base()
Custom legend guide
guide_legend_cross()
Cross legend guide
guide_legend_group()
Grouped legend

Primitives

These are incomplete guides used in composition.

guide-primitives
Guide primitives
primitive_box()
Guide primitives: boxes
primitive_bracket()
Guide primitive: brackets
primitive_fence()
Guide primitive: fence
primitive_labels()
Guide primitive: labels
primitive_line()
Guide primitive: line
primitive_segments()
Guide primitives: segments
primitive_spacer()
Guide primitive: spacer
primitive_ticks()
Guide primitive: line
primitive_title()
Guide primitive: title

Gizmos

These are specialty gimmicks tailored to displaying specific aesthetics.

guide-gizmos
Guide gizmos
gizmo_barcap()
Guide gizmo: capped colour bar
gizmo_density()
Guide gizmo: kernel density estimate
gizmo_grob()
Guide gizmo: custom grob
gizmo_histogram()
Guide gizmo: histogram
gizmo_stepcap()
Guide gizmo: capped colour steps

Composition

These are not guides, but ways to combine guides, primitives and gizmos together to become a more complete guide.

new_compose() experimental
Guide composition
compose_crux() experimental
Compose guides in a cross
compose_ontop() experimental
Compose guides on top of one another
compose_sandwich() experimental
Compose guides as a sandwich
compose_stack() experimental
Compose guides as stack

Keys

Fantastic labels and where to display them.

key_group_split() key_group_lut()
Group keys
key_range_auto() key_range_manual() key_range_map()
Range keys
key_segment_manual() key_segment_map() key_dendro()
Segment keys
key_sequence() key_bins()
Speciality keys
key_auto() key_manual() key_map() key_minor() key_log() key_none()
Standard keys

Other functions

Miscellaneous functions not directly concerned with guides

Bracket options
cap_triangle() cap_round() cap_arch() cap_ogee() cap_none()
Cap options
theme_guide()
Theme wrapper for guides
scale_x_dendro() scale_y_dendro()
